description: This file defines the TransactionsScreen widget and a dialog for adding/editing transactions in a Flutter app. It manages displaying a list of transactions, deleting, editing, and adding new transactions using Riverpod for state management.

classes.name: TransactionsScreen
classes.description: Main screen widget displaying the list of transactions with options to add, edit, and delete entries.

classes.name: TransactionFormDialog
classes.description: Dialog widget for adding or editing a transaction, with form validation and submission logic.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Build method for the TransactionsScreen widget, rendering the list and handling user interactions.

methods.name: _showTxForm
methods.description: Opens the transaction form dialog for adding or editing transactions.

methods.name: _prettyDate
methods.description: Formats DateTime objects into displayable date strings.

methods.name: _monthStr
methods.description: Returns abbreviated month name for a given month number.

methods.name: _TransactionFormDialogState.build
methods.description: Build method for the transaction form dialog, rendering form fields and handling submission.

methods.name: _submit
methods.description: Handles form validation and submits data to create or update a transaction.
